content: Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai is untracked in the journal, but is a Yaoguai Chief you'll fight as head up the Flaming Mountains in Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. The optional boss has to be plucked from the ground and uses poisonous moves to attack.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Nine-Capped_Lingzhi_Guai.md", under the primary heading "Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai". The content is presented below:

Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai is untracked in the journal, but is a Yaoguai Chief you'll fight as head up the Flaming Mountains in Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. The optional boss has to be plucked from the ground and uses poisonous moves to attack.
